name: SPLASH OUT
description:
PLEASE PLAY IN FULLSCREEN!

Yeah so this is just a game jam game I made and I hope you'll like it. 

I have used free premade assets for the textures (except the boats) and bought this little thing that helped me with the AI. Great value for your money btw.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/water/stylize-water-...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/free-stylized-pbr-te... 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/ai/arcade-vehicle-ai-220740 

The game is missing some features I wanted it to have but I had to cut corners...

And there was a lot of corners....

It's a racing game after all....
